platform.name: android
platform.info: You need to: * add "implements DatabaseInitializable" on your main class * implement the getDatabaseConfig method (with the correct database configuration) * implement the loadWebApp method (with the Cordova init code usually in the onCreate method) * remove the Cordova init code in the onCreate method * load the database and run the app with "DatabaseInitializer.load(this);" in the onCreate method * add the "Databases.db" file in your assets directory * add the zipped database to initialize in your assets directory
